Class ClientStatistics

java.lang.Object
org.infinispan.client.hotrod.impl.ClientStatistics
All Implemented Interfaces:
RemoteCacheClientStatisticsMXBean
public final class ClientStatistics extends Object implements RemoteCacheClientStatisticsMXBean

    • getRemoteStores

      public long getRemoteStores()
      Description copied from interface: RemoteCacheClientStatisticsMXBean
      Returns the number of remote cache stores (put, replace) that the client applied. Failed conditional operations do not increase the count of entries in the remote cache. Put operations always increase the count even if an operation replaces an equal value.
      Specified by:
      getRemoteStores in interface RemoteCacheClientStatisticsMXBean
